Gençler ben okumadan aldım siz almayın. Online oynamak isteyenler için olan oyun bu değil. Ben online için aldım ama yapıcak bişey yok online oynamak için alanlar half life'ın ilk oyununu alsın bu hikaye bazlı bir oyun. Ama salaklık benim olduğu için olumlu vermek zorundayım :D

I thought that time would not be kind to this game so I never bothered playing it and also remembered the pain of trying to set up and run the game as a kid, but I finally came around to getting the orange box and gave the game a try. I didnt expect much from this game since its 2020 and im sure the gameplay would be awful as well as the graphics but it turns out this game is fun and still looks good if you have a decent set up. I am enjoying the game and am glad I got the bundle so I can play the rest of the HL2 series.
In all honesty I wasn't really getting it until the final tour through the citadel. That was amazing.

Very creative and all the mechanics hold up well after all these years. I have never played this before and after the so many hours i could play for free I felt like i had to purchase. It holds up fantastically after all these years even if you never played it when it origianlly came out.

One the best games forever! New adventures of Gordon Freeman, his crowbar and new girlfriend Alyx Vance. Break striders, kill headcrabs and barnacles. I think this is pretty nice graphics even now. No one will spare if they play in it!

[h1] If you didn't played Half - Life 2, you cant call yourself a true gamer [/h1]
This game was so beautiful and magnificent for 12 years old me. And it still looks amazing. Characters, Soundtrack, Puzzles, AI, Graphics and Physics , that all still looks amazing for a 2004 game. Also game always changes gameplay, giving you a transport, new guns, new methods to fight with enemies and more. 
Conclusion:
[b] If you have 10 bucks, buy this game, it's a legendary game and you shouldn't miss it. [/b]
An awesome old school game, but never gets old.
